CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 28, 1959, page 1, reads: "Oath of Office - President Judge William H. McNaugher for the Board of Common Pleas Judges, administers the oath of office to Atty. Richard F. Jones became a member of the Pittsburgh Board of Public Education, while his daughter, Mrs. Donald E. Scott; wife, Eleanor, and former law partner, Judge Homer S. Brown of Common Pleas Court, look on. He fills vacancy created by Atty. Thomas Barton's resignation."
TitMainTitle: Judge William H. McNaugher administering oath to Atty. Richard F. Jones, while his daughter Mrs. Donald E. Scott, wife Eleanor Jones, and Judge Homer S. Brown, looking on in law office
